Sentence.value: The spinal cord is the bundle of nerves that runs from your brain down the center of your back.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The spinal cord is the bundle of [[nerves|C0027769]] that runs from your [[brain|C0006104]] down the center of your back.

Sentence.value: Nerves extend out from the spinal cord to every part of your body.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Nerves|C0027769]] extend out from the [[spinal cord|C0037925]] to every part of your body.

Sentence.value: A fatty brown pigment (lipofuscin) can also build up in nerve tissue.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: A fatty brown [[pigment|C0031916]] ([[lipofuscin|C0023789]]) can also build up in nerve tissue.

Sentence.value: They can be caused by brain diseases such as Alzheimer disease, which doctors believe is associated with plaques and tangles forming in the brain and the buildup of lipofuscin.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: They can be caused by [[brain diseases|C0006111]] such as [[Alzheimer disease|C0002395]], which doctors believe is associated with plaques and tangles forming in the [[brain|C0006104]] and the buildup of lipofuscin.

Sentence.value: Delirium is sudden confusion that leads to changes in thinking and behavior.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Delirium|C0011206]] is sudden [[confusion|C0009676]] that leads to changes in thinking and behavior.
